## SUPPORTED_CHAIN_ID type

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare type SUPPORTED_CHAIN_ID =

  | ChainId.Rinkeby
  | ChainId.Goerli
  | ChainId.Mumbai
  | ChainId.Polygon
  | ChainId.Fantom
  | ChainId.FantomTestnet

  | ChainId.Optimism
  | ChainId.OptimismTestnet
```
